main event: An observer reported sighting two hand-shaped objects that were red-yellow and emitting flashes for a duration of 30 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 30 minutes intermittently.,The objects were described as being the size of a penny.,The observer noted the colors of the objects as red-yellow.,The objects gave off flashes during the observation.,The conclusion suggested it might have been a bright star seen through fast-moving clouds.
sighted object: two hand-shaped objects giving off flashes
